alert.note: Alert for Eastern Toole and Liberty (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued November 08 at 2:24AM MST until November 09 at 9:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Eastern Toole and Liberty. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 PM MST Wednesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
